ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Comparison to other mothers in general, how good are you at soothing your baby when he/she is upset or distressed?
Notes: 0 = Much worse; 1 = Somewhat worse; 2 = As good; 3 = Better than others

ElementDescription: In comparison to other mothers in general, how good are you in understanding what your baby wants or needs?
Notes: 0 = Much worse; 1 = Somewhat worse; 2 = As good; 3 = Better than others

ElementDescription: In comparison to other mothers in general, how good are you at getting your baby to show-off for visitors?
Notes: 0 = Much worse; 1 = Somewhat worse; 2 = As good; 3 = Better than others

ElementDescription: Compared to other mothers, how good a mother do you feel you are?
Notes: 0 = Much worse; 1 = Somewhat worse; 2 = As good; 3 = Better than others

ElementDescription: Compared to other mothers in general, how good are you at knowing what activities your baby enjoys?
Notes: 0 = Much worse; 1 = Somewhat worse; 2 = As good; 3 = Better than others

ElementDescription: In comparison to other mothers in general, how good are you at finding things for your baby to do while doing housework?
Notes: 0 = Much worse; 1 = Somewhat worse; 2 = As good; 3 = Better than others

ElementDescription: Compared to other mothers in general, how good are you at feeding, changing, and bathing your baby?
Notes: 0 = Much worse; 1 = Somewhat worse; 2 = As good; 3 = Better than others

ElementDescription: Compared to other mothers in general, how good are you at making your baby understands what you want him to do?
Notes: 0 = Much worse; 1 = Somewhat worse; 2 = As good; 3 = Better than others

ElementDescription: Compared to other mothers in general, how good are you at getting and keeping your baby's attention?
Notes: 0 = Much worse; 1 = Somewhat worse; 2 = As good; 3 = Better than others

ElementDescription: In comparison to other mothers in general, how good are you at getting your baby to have fun with you?
Notes: 0 = Much worse; 1 = Somewhat worse; 2 = As good; 3 = Better than others
